task.title: How do I set preferences for live text?
task.shortdesc: If live text is available to you, you can turn it off or on and, if it is on, set the preferences for which items, or "content types," available to you are recognized as live text and how they appear.

context.p: Your administrator determines whether you have live text and, if you do, which items support live text and the options available for them.

step.cmd: Click Actions and preferencesPreferences and then click Live Text in the navigator.
Under Live Text, enable it to ensure that it is turned on, and select the style for the underline that displays for live text items or "content types."
Under Live Text Content Types, select the items or "content types" for which you want live text.
